menu.title: Buttermilk Pancakes
menu.desc: The flavor of milk shines in our buttermilk pancakes! Start your day with our silky-smooth pancakes and add sweetness to your morning.

menu.title: Diner Double Burger
menu.desc: A diner-style double burger, crafted for a hearty lunch! Perfectly juicy and packed with flavor to satisfy your cravings.

menu.title: Godzilla Milkshake
menu.desc: A legendary treat awaits! Treat yourself to our Godzilla Milkshake and take a sweet, creamy break.

menu.title: Countryside Breakfast Platter
menu.desc: The rustic flavors of a countryside breakfast are now here! Made with all-natural ingredients, this platter invites you to a delicious feast.

menu.title: Egg Attack
menu.desc: A hearty lunch loaded with eggs, fresh veggies, and savory toppings. Dive into this protein-packed delight!

menu.title: Oreo Dream
menu.desc: A dream come true for Oreo lovers! Our Oreo Dream milkshake transports you to a world of irresistible sweetness.

menu.title: Bacon Overflow
menu.desc: A breakfast essential for bacon enthusiasts! Crispy, freshly fried bacon and other delights make this the perfect way to start your day.

menu.title: American Classic
menu.desc: A classic American lunch with timeless flavors. Enjoy this satisfying meal at an unbeatable price!

menu.title: Quarantine Buddy
menu.desc: The perfect milkshake companion for boring quarantine days! Sweet, creamy, and ready to lift your mood.

menu.title: Bison Steak
menu.desc: Savor the unique taste of bison meat, seasoned with special spices and sauces. A premium choice for dinner!
